# Dwarves
Dwarves are in most respects fairly similar to Humans, having diverged fairly recently on an evolutionary timescale. Aside from their [color=#1e90ff]smaller stature[/color] and [color=#1e90ff]ability to regenerate damage by consuming alcohol,[/color] the differences between Humans and Dwarves are largely cultural.
## Dwarf Naming Conventions
Dwarves typically use a first name in their native language and two compounded words for their last name. - [color=#449944]Acceptable:[/color] Lorbam Shieldvault - [color=#449944]Acceptable:[/color] Solon Metalrope - [color=#449944]Acceptable:[/color] Tirist Stakearena - [color=#449944]Acceptable:[/color] Obok Mirrorgolden - [color=#449944]Acceptable:[/color] Unib Postknife - [color=#994444]Bad:[/color] Benry
